frame.name: Locale_closure
frame.definition:
<def-root>A building or location that can be sealed to prevent entrance, the <fen>Locale</fen>, ceases to be open for use.
<ex><fex name="loc">That park</fex> <t>closed</t> last year.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Locale
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Locale</fen> is the entity that ceases to be available for use.
<ex><fex name="loc">The other post office</fex> <t>closed</t> so they could build a new one.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> for the closure, if any.
<ex><fex name="loc">The oldpost office</fex> <t>closed</t> <fex name="exp">so they could build a new one</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Containing_event
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Containing_event</fen> describes some event in which the closure occurs.
<ex><fex name="loc">Yosemite</fex> swiftly <t>closed</t> <fex name="Containing_event">when the wildfires were sweeping through</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Depictive</fen> describes something about the <fen>Locale</fen>.
<ex><fex name="loc">The police department</fex>, <fex name="dep">suffering from 100 years of wear and tear</fex>, <t>closed its doors</t> <fex name="tim">in 2003</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> of the closure.
<ex><fex name="loc">The fire department</fex> <t>closed</t> <fex name="tim">in 2008 </fex> after the city ceased to be incorporated.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Manner</fen> describes the way in which the <fen>Locale</fen> closed.
<ex><fex name="loc">Yosemite</fex> <fex name="man">swiftly</fex> <t>closed</t> when the wildfires swept through.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Circumstances</fen> that caused closure. Compared to <fen>Explanation</fen>, this describes situations or environments that lead to failure, not a specific reason for failure.
<ex><fex name="loc">Public spaces</fex> often <t>close</t> <fex name="cir">amid political or economic chaos</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Place</fen> of the failing locale.
<ex><fex name="loc">Every park</fex> <t>closed</t> <fex name="pla">in New York City</fex> <fex name="tim">last week</fex> <fex name="exp">for the fireworks</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition:
<def-root>The length of time that the <fen>Locale</fen> remains closed.
<ex>The shop <t>closed</t> <fex name="dur">for three hours</fex> while police did their investigation.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: close.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: A locale ceases to be available for use.
